column1: Uchi////-- Hamachi Cure :: What attracted me at first was the garlic brittle. However
column2: the garlic was barely noticeable. There were just some fried bits sprinkled around. I guess this was for the best so that it wouldn't mar the taste of the fish. The brittle was not so brittle
column3: and the texture was a bit soft
column4: almost stale. The pear and almond paired really well with all the flavors though.
